name: Atomania
overview: Atomania is a Atomix variant. In each one-screen level, there are a number of atoms with different colors which need to be arranged in a certain fashion: a picture of the end result is displayed in the upper left corner. The player controls a cursor which has be moved over the atoms in order to send them on their way. However, they only stop when they hit a wall or another obstacle. The goal needs to be reached within a certain amount of moves and there are three difficulty levels.
